title: An Act requiring consumer notification for chatbot systems

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Finegold, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 243) of Barry R. Finegold for legislation to require consumer notification for software or computer program that simulates human conversation or chatter through text or voice interactions.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/01/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 10/01/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                       and Virtual Hearing location changed
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
